PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02852018-03-12,  ,  CH,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ADAD HANNAH of Burnaby, British Columbia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective April 1, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ADAD HANNAH of Burnaby, British Columbia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective April 1, 2018.
